newsitem.title: USA: Hughes Supply to buy Sunbelt Supply.
newsitem.headline: Hughes Supply to buy Sunbelt Supply.

text.p: Hughes Supply Inc, which distributes construction and industrial materials, said on Monday it signed a letter of intent to buy Sunbelt Supply Co for an undisclosed number of Hughes Supply shares.

The acquisition, which is subject to certain conditions, was expected to close on or about December 31, the company said. Houston-based Sunbelt distributes industrial valves, flanges and fittings. Its sales for the fiscal year ended July 31, 1996 were about $69 million, Hughes said.
No personnel changes were anticipated, the company said.
